name: Tailwind v4 @theme does not support transitions or z-index
description: When migrating CSS custom properties to Tailwind v4's @theme directive, transitions (timing functions) and z-index values are not supported inside @theme. They must be placed in a separate :root {} block as standard CSS custom properties. Colors, fonts, spacing, radius, and shadows all work inside @theme.

trigger.errorMessage: Transition duration/timing and z-index values silently ignored when placed inside @theme directive in Tailwind v4

steps.description: Place colors, fonts, spacing, radius, and shadows inside @theme {}. Place transitions (--transition-fast, etc.) and z-index values (--z-modal, etc.) in a separate :root {} block below the @theme block.
